summary.para: Called to cause the text service to display a dialog box to register a word with the text service.

param.name: hwndParent
param.para: Handle of the parent window. The text service typically uses this as the parent or owner window when creating the dialog box.

param.name: langid
param.para: Contains a LANGID that specifies the identifier of the language currently used by the Input Method Editor (IME).

param.name: rguidProfile
param.para: Contains a GUID that specifies the language profile identifier that the text service is under. This is the value specified in when the profile was added.

param.name: bstrRegistered
param.para: Contains a BSTR that contains the word to be registered with the text service. This is optional and can be NULL. If NULL, the text service should display a default register word dialog box.

returns.para: This method can return one of these values.

description.para: The text service does not implement this method.

summary.para: The ITfFnConfigureRegisterWord interface is implemented by a text service to enable the Active Input Method Editor (IME) to cause the text service to display a word registration dialog box.
To obtain an instance of this interface the IME can call with IID_ITfFnConfigureRegisterWord.
